weekly_top_story.headline: Breakthrough Breast Cancer Vaccine Trial by Duke Health Shows 24-Year Survival
weekly_top_story.summary: Duke Health researchers announced that a small group of women with advanced breast cancer involved in a vaccine trial over two decades ago are all alive today, demonstrating durable immune response and a potential new avenue for treatment.

stories.headline: White House Expands Most-Favored-Nation Drug Pricing Program to GLP-1 Therapies
stories.summary: The Trump Administration extended its drug pricing initiative to include major anti-obesity GLP-1 drugs such as Ozempic and Wegovy, integrating Medicare Part D coverage and promising broader access for obesity treatment.

stories.headline: Medicare Telehealth and Hospital-at-Home Services Resume Nationwide
stories.summary: Following the end of the government shutdown, Medicare reinstated telehealth flexibilities including audio-only visits and hospital-at-home programs, improving remote care access for rural, senior, and disabled populations nationwide.
